feat.name: Construct Body
entries: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against poison or effects that would impose the sleep condition. If you roll a success on a saving throw against poison or an effect that would impose the sleep condition, you get a critical success instead.

feat.name: Construct Lock
entries: You are skilled at finding constructs' weak points due to your understanding of your own construction. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against constructs. If your attack would deal more than one weapon die of damage (as is common at higher levels than 1st), the bonus is equal to the number of weapon dice or unarmed attack dice.

In addition, if a creature critically succeeds at an attack against you and deals damage to you, you gain your bonus to damage against that creature for 1 minute regardless of whether it has the chosen trait.

feat.name: Fall In Line
entries: Your soldier background makes you quick to work in group cohesion. When you Follow the Expert, the circumstance bonus to your skill check is based on your ally's proficiency plus 1 (+3 for expert, +4 for master, and +5 for legendary).

feat.name: Mithral Tracery
entries: You have traces of mithral forged onto your frame that make you lighter. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

feat.name: Powerful Slam
entries: You were forged with steel reinforced limbs. You gain a slam unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has the shove trait.

feat.name: Sentry Vision
entries: Your vision capabilities were crafted to see through dim light. You gain low-light vision.

feat.name: Warforged Bulwark
entries: You were design to be more armored than other warforged. You are trained with light armor. If you are already trained in light armor, then you are trained in medium armor, and if you are already trained in medium armor, then you are trained in heavy armor.

feat.name: Warforged Lore
entries: You gain the trained proficiency rank in Athletics and Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Warforged Lore.

feat.name: Warforged Weapon Familiarity
entries: Your wartime training makes you trained with all sorts of weapons. You are trained with the armblade, armbow, and battlefist. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon warforged weapons. For you, martial warforged weapons are simple weapons and advanced warforged weapons are martial weapons.

feat.name: Battle Readiness
entries: Your military training makes you react quicker than others. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks made as initiative rolls. Additionally, if your initiative roll result is tied with that of an opponent, you go first, regardless of whether you rolled Perception or not.

feat.name: Construct Resiliency
entries: Poison that harms "fleshies" has little effect against your mechanical frame. You gain resistance to poison equal to half your level.

feat.name: Nocturnal Vision
entries: You have further enhanced your forged sight. You gain Darkvision.

feat.name: Spiked Frame
entries: Iron spikes have been crafted onto your frame. Your unarmed attacks gain the Versatile (piercing) trait. When a creature grabs or restrains you with its body, it takes persistent bleed damage equal to one fourth of your level.

feat.name: Storage Unit
entries: You have crafted an inner compartment within your body to store items. Your compartment holds up to 2 Bulk of items, and these items don't count against your Bulk limits.

feat.name: Warforged Weapon Competence
entries: You are well trained with the weapons of war. Whenever you critically hit using a warforged weapon or one of the weapons listed in Warforged Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

feat.name: Cold Iron Tracery
entries: You have traces of cold iron forged onto your frame. Your unarmed attacks count as cold iron weapons. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against effects from creatures with weakness to cold iron (such as most demons and fey).

feat.name: Construct Soul
entries: You also gain the benefits of your Construct Body against effects that would inflict the Doomed, Drained, Fatigued, Paralyzed or Sickened condition.

feat.name: Silver Tracery
entries: You have traces of silver forged onto your frame. Your unarmed attacks count as silver weapons. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against effects from creatures with weakness to silver (such as most devils and werecreatures).

feat.name: Innate Forge
entries: You tap into your magical core, gaining the properties of the forge that created you. You gain a resistance to fire damage equal to half your level, and you can cast 5th-level Creation as an innate arcane spell once per day.

feat.name: Juggernaut Function
entries: You have discovered the secret to how warforged juggernauts operate. Your body becomes larger, granting you size and additional reach. You gain the effects of Enlarge constantly.

feat.name: Warforged Weapon Expertise
entries: You are an expert with the weapons of war. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed in Warforged Weapon Familiarity.

feat.name: Warforged Bulwark Competence
feat.prerequisites: Warforged Bulwark; Trained in medium armor
entries: You gain the armor specialization effects of medium and heavy armor.

feat.name: Adamantine Tracery
entries: You have traces of adamantine forged onto your frame. Your unarmored attacks count as adamantine weapons. You gain resistance to physical damage equal to one fourth your level, except from adamantine weapons.

feat.name: Superior Juggernaut
entries: Your juggernaut frame has stabilized, allowing for greater support. You are no longer clumsy due to the effects of enlarge and your maximum Hit Points increase by your level.

feat.name: Warforged Bulwark Expertise
entries: You are an expert with your armor. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain armor, you also gain that proficiency in the armor you gain proficiency with from Warforged Bulwark.
